text: I'm proud to support Violet's Law alongside my Congressional colleagues. Read this op-ed to learn more about how a provision in the 2023 Farm Bill will retire healthy animals from federal research labs. sandiegouniontribune.com/opi…

Thank you President Biden for announcing that an additional 125k Americans have been approved for $9bill in debt relief through fixes to income driven repayment (IDR) and Public Service Loan Forgiveness, and by cancelling debt for borrowers with total and permanent disabilities.

I proudly voted for the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law to restore California’s infrastructure. I'm committed to investing in our country, by fixing roads & bridges, bringing clean water & high-speed internet to communities, & strengthening advanced manufacturing & clean energy.

October is #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth, please join me in honoring breast cancer fighters, survivors, their families and caregivers, and the loved ones we’ve lost. We must commit to finding a cure and support the more than 240,000 people diagnosed each year.
With the 45 days provided by this funding extension, we must work together in a bi-partisan effort and invest in our Country to fund the critical services hardworking families need.
I’m honored to represent more than 84,000 Filipino Americans in Congress, as we commemorate their legacy in my district and across our country.

I’m proud to join my Congressional colleagues in recognizing Filipino Americans and their contributions to the United States. During this month, we celebrate their rich history and culture that make up the diverse fabric of our nation.

I’m working with my Congressional colleagues to avoid a Republican led government shutdown that would lead to 21,310 people, including 4,078 infants and 13,377 children, in #CA52 losing access to SNAP and WIC benefits.

I am saddened to hear about the passing of Senator Feinstein. It was an honor to work alongside her. She will be deeply missed and remembered for her dedication to public service. I send my prayers and condolences to her family and loved ones.

It is time to realize the devastating impact of the climate crisis and the harms of underinvestment in our communities. That's why I’m proud to cosponsor
@RepBowman and @SenMarkey’s Green New Deal for Public Schools to make transformative investments in public education!

Student loan payments restart on October 1st!  Approximately 1 in 5 student borrowers will struggle with student debt repayments. That’s over 8 million borrowers.

Our borrowers deserve student debt relief. #StudentDebtRelief.

Today, I asked @GaryGensler about the importance of the @SECGov climate disclosure rule to provide investors with the information needed to make informed, sustainable financial decisions for their families.
Congratulations to the San Diego Unified School District for the dedication of the new George Walker Smith Education Complex, the rebuilt Central Elementary and Wilson Middle School in City Heights!

September is suicide prevention month, If you or anyone you know is struggling, please reach out to someone and call or text the 988 life line. 
Let us come together to support one another against a major public health concern and a leading cause of death in the U.S.

46 years ago today, the 1977 Food Stamp Act was signed into law, setting the framework for the modern Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) we know today. I’m proud to continually support SNAP so that families and those in need can put food on their tables.

I’m proud to have signed onto the tri-caucus letter, with more than 60 of my colleagues, urging @secbecerra to reinstate Medicaid coverage for over 500,000 children & adults. Thank you for protecting vulnerable families & informing states & territories of their legal duties.

The Biden-Harris Administration has recently updated the Technical Assistance Guide, which provides resources to help communities access opportunities and programs from President Biden's Investing in America Agenda. 

Learn more: bit.ly/3EOGqkk

NARAL Pro-Choice America is now fighting for our future & freedoms as Reproductive Freedom for All. With more than 4 million members, @reproforall  works to ensure that everyone is free to make their own decisions about their bodies & lives. I’m proud to stand alongside them.

Today, I questioned @SecGov about the risk that climate change poses to our financial markets. The American people deserve to know how their retirement savings and pensions may be impacted by unsustainable business practices.

It was great meeting with @CANVLeagues! Credit unions serve an important role providing my constituents with low-cost financial options to purchase a home, invest in their child's education, and build generational wealth.
If House Republicans follow through on their threats to shut down the government, they will hurt working families and small businesses across the country. We can’t afford a shutdown.

Before the @CFPB was created, financial institutions saddled consumers w/predatory & discriminatory loans that ultimately crashed our entire economy in 2008. We can’t go backwards. We need a strong #CFPB to keep consumers & our financial system safe! #HandsOffTheCFPB #DefendCFPB
Many thanks to the Biden-Harris Administration, for allocating $1 billion to local communities for urban tree-planting and management through the USDA Forest Service’s Urban and Community Forestry.
I am proud to announce that #CA52 has received a total of $500,000 in funding through the Urban and Community Forestry Program!

This Hispanic Heritage Month I'd like to recognize the cultures and communities that have contributed to the fabric and achievements of the United States. Our diversity is our strength, and I am proud to serve the Hispanic community.

Today, the Sustainable Investment Caucus released a statement on the mark-up of @HouseGOP's Anti-ESG Bills in the @EdWorkforceCmte. 

Learn more: bit.ly/3RqqaNJ

I would like to congratulate the City of National City, in partnership with Circuit, for launching a new shuttle service available. With the support of the California Air Resources board, thank you for spearheading this initiative to address air quality and transportation!
This ruling is another stark reminder that we need to provide citizenship for DACA recipients.

This ruling is the latest in a string of attacks on migrant youth by an anti-immigrant judge, who is committed to stripping DACA recipients of their legal right to build a life in the only nation they have ever called home.
Thank you, @NAFCU. It was a pleasure speaking at #NAFCUCaucus about the vital role that Credit Unions serve in promoting financial literacy and helping my constituents become homeowners!
If you are a Veteran in CA-52 interested in how to receive PACT Act benefits, please contact my office for more information!
For more information on updated COVID-19 vaccines visit: cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nco…

It's been a pleasure serving with my colleague @RepCasten on the Sustainable Investment Caucus to protect the financial and economic wellbeing of American families, teachers, social workers, and first responders!

eenews.net/articles/the-demo…

On the 22nd anniversary of 9/11, we remember and honor the nearly 3,000 lives lost, their families, and all the brave first responders and service members who risked their lives to save others.  #neverforget911

58 years ago, today was the start of the Delano Grape Strike and Boycott by both Latino and Filipino workers. I would like to recognize the efforts of those who fought to unionize, build the middle class, and protect workers' rights.
SDSU Opens $10 Million Center to Help Underserved Communities Get Federal Environmental Funding timesofsandiego.com/educatio… via @TimesofSanDiego

The center will tailor services and assistance to help overburdened communities most impacted by environmental issues. Funding for the center is provided from the recent historic investments through the Biden Administration’s Investing in America agenda.

Today, I joined my colleague
@RepScottPeters, @SDSU's President Adela del la Torre, and the @EPA's Director of Southern California Field Office Noemi Emeric-Ford, in announcing the launch of the Center for Community Energy and Environmental Justice.

On #LaborDay, I'm honoring American workers & celebrating the hard-won accomplishments of the labor movement – like the 8-hour workday & the 5-day workweek. As we fight to raise wages & protect the right to organize, I'm committed to ensuring that every worker’s voice is heard.
Thank you to the Inflation Reduction Act that will save Seniors money across California when Medicare negotiates to lower drug prices!

.@RedCross opened 2 shelters – one  
in North & South County for people forced from homes due to the storm: 

• Southwestern College Jaguar Aquatics Wellness & Sports, 900 Otay Lakes Road, Chula Vista

• Corky Smith Gymnasium, 274 Pico Ave., San Marcos

#Floods are the most common natural disaster in the U.S. Sign-up for local alerts & warnings now!

readysandiego.org/alertsandi…

Planning for a storm is a team effort, & the @CityofSanDiego is taking preventative measures starting today. 

Sand bags will also be available for pick up at ten recreation centers across the city (sand not provided). 

Find locations & helpful tips here: sandiego.gov/storm-preparedn…

💊 Lower prescription drug costs
🏥 Lower health care costs
⚡ Lower energy costs
 
One year ago, @HouseDemocrats delivered the #InflationReductionAct to lower costs for American families — and I'm working to continue that progress.

Proud to join the @HispanicCaucus in urging @TheJusticeDept and @DHSgov to investigate possible unlawful activity toward migrant families at the Southern Border. America should welcome vulnerable people with open arms, not further pain and suffering.

pbs.org/newshour/politics/hi…

Cynthia Kaser, of @lamaestrachc, is our district’s August Constituent of the Month. 

She’s been in charge of developing the center’s outreach program — which included 5 health fairs every day through #NationalHealthCenterWeek. 

This is huge. Thanks so much, Cynthia!

As a Progressive Democrat, I am deeply proud to support @AIPAC. AIPAC is an invaluable source of information and a strong ally of peace & stability in the Middle East. 

Thank you AIPAC for your support of the ironclad relationship between America 🇺🇸 and Israel 🇮🇱.

I stand with our Leader @repjeffries as he advocates for Israel 🇮🇱, our strategic democratic ally in the Middle East, and her right to self-defense.

Thank you Leader Jeffries for your commitment to the ironclad relationship between America and Israel.

(2/2): This was only made possible by the Biden-Harris Administration’s Rebuilding American Infrastructure with Sustainability and Equity (RAISE) program — which funds critical infrastructure projects across the country.

(1/2): @SANDAG, in partnership with the City of Chula Vista, was awarded $21.5 million for the Palomar Street Grade Separation Project. This will create a passenger & freight rail corridor while eliminating the rail crossing that causes delays & accidents for drivers.

🚨 Massive news for nearly 50,000 veterans and their families in our district 🚨 

Veterans now have until Monday, Aug. 14 at 11:59 pm to file their PACT Claim or submit an intent to file to receive up to a year of backdated benefits. 

Apply today: VA.gov/PACT

The #CHIPSandScienceAct was signed one year ago today & communities across the country are already feeling the impacts of the Investing in America agenda through: 

💵Good-paying jobs 
📉Easing Inflation 
🔬Research & Innovation

Do you frequently cross the border through San Ysidro or Otay Mesa? 🚗 @SDCaltrans and @SANDAG are conducting a new Border Wait Time Survey and want to hear from you! 

Survey is open until August 11!
 
🔗 bit.ly/BorderWaitTimeSurvey

Los demócratas estamos reduciendo costos para familias trabajadoras. Juntos nos enfrentamos a los grupos influyentes con intereses especiales para reducir la inflación un 60 porciento desde el verano pasado.
(2/2): No one is above the law, not even a former U.S. President. Today’s indictment is another step towards accountability and justice.

(1/2): President Trump’s recent charge for participating in efforts to overturn the 2020 election results only adds to his long & undeniably corrupt pattern. He now has a total of 2 impeachments and 3 indictments.
I mean….

This #NationalInternDay, I’d like to thank our remarkable interns who go above and beyond each day behind-the-scenes to serve constituents. 

My staff and I are proud of their work, and we can’t wait to see their future accomplishments!

Recently, Team Vargas attended the Veterans Village of San Diego Stand Down event. As many other participants at the fair, in any way we can, we are ready to assist veterans who have selflessly served our nation.

It was an honor to welcome Israeli President @isaac_herzog as he joined us for a joint session of Congress to celebrate Israel's 75th anniversary. I’m proud to carry on the tradition of supporting Israel in Congress!

Today, I introduced the Environmentally Sustainable Growth Act to protect consumers, reduce climate damage, and defend labor standards from the @HouseGOP's attacks by better educating Americans on the ESG practices of public companies.

Learn more: tinyurl.com/365x78bs

As a former city councilman & state legislator, I’ve spent my life working with my community. Staying connected with community leaders & supporting local businesses that provide sustainability is key to conservation advocacy. Policies like #ESG benefit the American public.

It’s critical that we continue investing in clean, renewable energy resources -- and I thank @potus for his work on this. 

I'm fighting for Americans by championing #ESG so consumers have a better understanding of which private companies have sound environmental practices.

Everyday, we continue to hear about rising temperatures & continued effects of climate change. 

That's why I'm championing the #ESG movement to help American families (if they would like) invest in companies that better protect our environment.

This starts with ESG disclosures!

To celebrate the 10th Anniversary of Latino Conservation Week, I’m joining @LCVoters, @ChispaLcv, and the @HispanicCaucus for a Twitter Q&A!

We'll discuss the importance of equitable conservation that expands access to a healthy outdoors!

📆Jul. 18
🕑3-4 pm ET

The @housegop’s calculated attack against ESG serves only to protect shady special interest groups. It’s that simple. I will continue to fight for our environment, American consumers, and fair labor standards. #ESG
I would like to recognize Aurora Soriano Cudal-Rivera for her dedication to the community and residents of CA-52! Happy 90th Birthday!

Today, during an @FSCDems hearing, I called out @houseGOP's attempt to limit investor choices & push anti-free market policies that would expose my constituents & America to climate risk. 

American families deserve the info they need to make profitable, sustainable decisions.

Today, I led a press conference with @RepCasten & @RepMaxineWaters to sound the alarm on the @housegop's attack against ESG. Thanks to my colleagues, Minnesota AG @keithellison, & stakeholders for fighting to protect consumers, reduce climate damage, and defend labor standards.

Climate risk IS investment risk. That’s why I'm working overtime to stop the MAGA Republican anti-ESG agenda that would deny investors the option to screen our environmentally or socially harmful stocks.

Team Vargas attended the swearing in ceremony for @SouthCountyEDC's new FY2023-2024 Board of Directors and incoming Chair of the Board, Debbie Espe. Thank you to Patricia Alvarez - last year's Chair of the Board - for all your contributions to the community and South County EDC.

Congratulations to Xochitl Torres Small on her confirmation as the new Deputy Secretary for @USDA. 

I worked alongside her in the @HispanicCaucus, so I know we are in great hands. Wishing her all the best in this new role!

Thank you to my friend, @gracenapolitano, for being a great colleague and dedicated public servant who fights for everyday families across California.

You’ll be missed in Congress, but I look forward to working alongside you until 2024!

#CA52 is made up of hard-working, dedicated individuals that Republicans have attacked by cutting social security and giving tax cuts to the wealthy. President Biden has created over 13 million jobs and restored confidence in our nation’s economy. That’s Bidenomics at work.
Happy Fourth of July 🇺🇸!

Using its proxies in the West Bank, Iran is launching unchecked attacks against Israel. America must stand with Israel and always support her right to self-defense. There can be no peace if the PA is used as a staging ground for Terrorism.

Today, Team Vargas attended the @USCIS naturalization ceremony of 50 men and women in uniform aboard the USS Midway. What a great way to celebrate America’s independence and the ideals that started our nation.

Congrats to our #newcitizens!

Another decision, another blow to America by #SCOTUS— adding to this growing legitimacy crisis.

Republican-appointed justices have turned their back on LGBTQ+ communities, minorities, and students this week.

The Supreme Court struck down affirmative action today — undoing decades of progress. 

This will hurt vulnerable communities and create additional challenges on their journey to attain a high-quality education.
Congrats to the @chsadc familia for graduating from this @CHCI LHSA course!
the Congressional Sustainable Investment Caucus hosted a roundtable with @ILTreasurer, @BrookeELierman, and @bryanmcgannon.
Last week, as Co-Chairs, @RepCasten & I questioned witnesses about ESG risks & discussed the importance of accurate market information for investors & constituents.

Today, the @FTA_DOT announced $1.7 billion for green buses, upgrading facilities, and investing in workforce development—all thanks to @potus’ Bipartisan Infrastructure Law. 

#peopleoverpolitics

As the one-year mark of the #DobbsDecision comes to a close, I promise to double down on the fight for #ReproductiveFreedom for ALL women.

Abortion IS healthcare — and it’s a decision that should be made by a woman and her doctor, NOT politicians. 

#AbortionIsHealthcare
(2/2): That’s why today, I sent a letter to the @CFPB  urging them to review their remittance disclosures to make sure all costs are fully transparent – and not a surprise.

(1/2): Many hard-working #immigrants have families and loved ones abroad who rely on them for financial assistance. Sending funds to their families in another country, known as remittance, should be accessible, easy, and transparent – not riddled with expensive hidden fees.

Our First Place Winner, Natalia Gonzalez Llamas, flew to Washington D.C. with her Mom Sara for this year’s Congressional Art competition reception. Natalia's piece "One Day at a Time" hangs in the Capitol tunnels for the entire year! Congratulations, and it was great to meet you!

At today's @FSCDems hearing, I spoke about the undeniable link between climate change and financial stability in the U.S. I strongly support the @secgov's new climate disclosure rules, and I applaud their work in making environmental risk factors known to investors & the public.

Cost benefit analysis, which serves as the man function of the @SECGov’s Division of Economic & Risk Analysis, has been weaponized by Wall Street and large corporations to delay financial regulation. 

@FSCDems are sounding the alarm now. 📺: bit.ly/465BrYF

During today’s @fscdems hearing, I spoke to @federalreserve Chair Powel about the very real threat that climate change poses to our communities and financial system. 

It's critical that we address this looming threat to protect future generations.

Instead of supporting retirement security for America’s seniors, extreme MAGA Republicans are trying to cut Social Security and Medicare. These cuts will rip away the security and peace of mind that seniors earned through hard work.

Recently, I hosted the @WhiteHouseHPI alongside fellow community leaders. We learned more about the President’s Advisory Commission that’s working towards advancing education equity and economic opportunity for Latinos. Together, we can bring more opportunities to #CA-52!

Happy #Juneteenth2023!

Today is a special day to commemorate the history, progress, & power of the African American community.

On this day, America also recommits itself to the work of justice, equality, and equity.

I will always fight for Dreamers and their families. They contribute so much to America, and they are Americans in their mind, soul, and heart. 

Read my statement on the 11th anniversary of the DACA program below:

Today, I spoke at a press conference hosted by @WeAreUnidosUS to celebrate their new initiative that aims to increase Latino homeownership. 

Was proud to stand by @HispanicCaucus Chair @RepBarragan and @SenatorMenendez as we raised awareness on this important issue!

Today, I questioned Director Rohit Chopra on what the Consumer Protection Bureau is doing to protect consumers, more specifically Latinos. Here are the facts: 80% of people, including both Republicans and Democrats, support the @CFPB and want the agency to continue its work.

It was an honor to give opening remarks for @US_SIF 's Hill Day. Thank you for your work in highlighting the importance of #ESG and supporting the Congressional Sustainable Investment Caucus — which I’m proud to Co-Chair.

The bottom line is, the SEC should continue to lead the regulation of the U.S. crypto market, and Congress must do its part to provide them with the resources they need! ✔️

Join us as we discuss 📺: bit.ly/45YthBi

Every day, 33 children are injured while working on U.S. farms. @RepRaulRuizMD's #CAREAct reduces fatalities and injuries of child farmworkers in our agriculture industry. That’s why I proudly support it, along with protecting child farmworker labor rights.
On June 12, 1948, President Truman signed legislation allowing women to serve as permeant members of our nation’s military. On this #WomenVeteransDay we honor and celebrate our women veterans!

Seven years later, we remember the lives lost at Pulse Nightclub in Orlando, Florida. This #PrideMonth, I’m committed to protecting our LGBTQI+ community and bringing more love to our #CA52 communities.
Extreme MAGA Republicans are continuing their march to ban abortion nationwide with no exceptions – taking away reproductive freedom and even jailing doctors and nurses.

Los demócratas ponen al Pueblo > la Política. En lugar de juegos políticos, estamos trabajando para reducir los costos, crear trabajos mejor pagados, crear comunidades más seguras y defender nuestras libertades.
Use #Medicaid? Listen up and stay covered! Medicaid renewals were paused due to #COVID19, but they’re back! Don’t wait – update!
This June, let us bring awareness for the fight to #ENDALZ during Alzheimer’s & Brain Awareness Month.
Keep it up, @chsadc familia!
Democrats are putting People Over Politics. Instead of playing political games, we are working to lower costs, create better paying jobs, make our communities safer, and defend our freedoms.
Today, at @FSCDems I took a stand to protect the U.S. dollar, and questioned witnesses on why some are focusing on taxing our most vulnerable communities instead of the wealthy.

58 years ago today, the landmark case Griswold v. Connecticut guaranteed married couples the right to contraception use. While these rights continue to be threatened, let us continue the fight to ensuring access to reproductive healthcare. #GratefulforGriswold

Democrats are putting People Over Politics. We are fighting to protect our freedoms, lower costs, create better paying jobs, and make our communities safer.
Happy #jobs day! According to @JECDems, President Biden just became the first president in US history to preside over the creation of 13 million jobs!

June is National Gun Violence Awareness month, and this weekend we #wearorange to honor the victims of gun violence. Let us commemorate the lives lost too soon and continue our commitment to protecting families from gun violence.
Happy #PrideMonth!
Happy Pride Month! Let us celebrate and honor those who are a part of the LGBTQ+ community!

As we close mental health month, let’s honor the memories of those we have lost and prevent others from managing their mental health challenges alone. If you or someone you know is in a mental health crisis, text, chat, or call 988 for free, confidential support 24/7.

Only days away from national Gun Violence Awareness month, another mass shooting has plagued America -- this time in Florida. Thoughts and prayers are not enough. As mass shootings continue to pile up year after year, we need to take action to #EndGunViolence.

This May and AAPI Heritage Month, Jonathan Burgos, Founder and Executive Director of First Gen Scholars is our #CA52 Constituent of the month! Thank you for your efforts to support First generation college students in their higher education endeavors.

Today and forever, we #RememberAndHonor America’s fallen service members. 🇺🇸 

As a nation, we will always be grateful for their ultimate sacrifice. #MemorialDay2023

As we close out National Public Works Week, I’d like to thank all the remarkable public works professionals across San Diego and the U.S. 

Your commitment to our communities is crucial for healthy and vibrant neighborhoods. We appreciate you!

21% of Latino households experience food insecurity. Republicans aim to make it harder for them to eat a warm meal through cruel work requirements that are proven to keep families below the poverty line. 

The @hispaniccaucus and I are committed to protecting these families.

Team Vargas attended the signing ceremony for World Design Capital 2024, which celebrates the region’s innovative designs for a better future. This is the first time that the two cities – San Diego and Tijuana – were selected & it speaks volumes to our cross-border collaboration.

Democrats are united to pay America’s bills, not play politics. We are committed to lowering costs for working families and create better paying jobs for everyday Americans. For CA-52, I will continue to fight in Congress for critical jobs and economic stability.

The @HouseGOP's Default on America Act would immediately cut veterans’ health care programs by $2 billion. That's unacceptable. 

I will continue to fight for our service members who dedicated their lives for our country. Veterans deserve access to vital healthcare programs.

Today we remember the 19 students and 2 teachers who were tragically taken by an evil act of gun violence in Uvalde, Texas. There are no words to fully express the pain their families and community must feel. I promise to always fight to protect our nation from gun violence.

Today, at the @FSCDems hearing I asked The Honorable Sandra L. Thompson, Director of the @FHFA, about current constraints on our nations' housing supply and the barriers first time homebuyers face in the current housing market.

Join @FSCDems at 10:00 am as we hold a hearing regarding a recent mortgage pricing update that will help communities in rural areas where lower home prices offer more entry-level homeownership opportunities for creditworthy first-time homebuyers. 🏠👪

Let's thank our military members for their patriotic support of our country! Happy Armed Forces day!
This #infrastructure week we are celebrating $220 billion so far in Bipartisan Infrastructure Law funding and 32,000+ specific projects and awards in 4,500 communities across America.
Today I asked at the @FSCDems hearing: "What can we do so that Americans don't lose money when a bank fails?”. Protecting our communities' financial health must be our greatest priority.

The immediate action taken by the Biden administration & regulators in the wake of three major bank failures:

 ✔️ Protected depositors
 ✔️ Costs taxpayers NOTHING
 ✔️ Ensures Americans can have confidence in their banking system

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law -- which I proudly supported -- the Palm Avenue Bridge in our District will be repaired and make our communities safer and more accessible. #peopleoverpolitics

Heartbroken to learn about the recent shooting in Farmington, New Mexico. My heart goes out to the victims and their families. We need gun reform NOW, enough is enough!
By passing @RepUnderwood, @RepAdams, and @SenBooker’s #Momnibus, we will make the investments we need so that moms can have safe and healthy pregnancies.
Happy Mother’s Day!
More border walls won’t stop drugs like fentanyl coming into the country. It will cost the American Taxpayers millions of dollars.

Instead of trying to find real solutions to a broken immigration system, extreme Republicans are advancing the Child Deportation Act – legislation      that is so extreme even some House Republicans have called it “un-Christian.”

Heartbroken to watch Israel under attack at the hands of terrorists. Palestinian Islamic Jihad is fully responsible for all the deaths caused by these terrorist acts.

The United States stands with our closest ally Israel and their right to defend themselves. 🇮🇱

Today I spoke @FSCDems about the nation's recent bank failures. I applaud @POTUS, @FDICgov, and @federalreserve for protecting depositors and limiting contagion - all without costing American taxpayers a dime.

(1/2): Thank you to all the students who participated in our annual Congressional Art Competition! It was great to see so many young artists out with their families.

This Jewish American Heritage Month, we recommit ourselves to fighting antisemitism and ensuring the Jewish community across our country can live peacefully.  

Antisemitism has no place in our country, and we must always call out this hate when we see it.

Our 2023 Congressional Art Competition Reception will start at 6:00 pm PST tonight.

We will recognize and celebrate our community's talented high school artists.

Hope to see you there!

Recently, Team Vargas joined the Vietnamese Buddhist Community of San Diego to celebrate #Vesakday . This is a sacred day for millions of Buddhists worldwide. 

It’s a time to commemorate the birth, enlightenment, and passing of Gautama Buddha – who is the founder of Buddhism!

We will recognize and celebrate our community's talented high school artists.

My heart breaks for the victims of the Allen Outlets shooting.

Prayers are needed, but they’re not enough. We all must work together to stop this plague once and for all. 

Our families deserve to live without fear of gun violence. Enough is enough.

The new bike route - Border to Bayshore- will allow a connection between the San Ysidro Port of Entry and Imperial Beach! Thank you @SANDAG for providing more options for safe and clean multimodal transportation. Construction to be completed in 2025.

Barrio Logan College Institute gave us a tour of their site and spoke about their work to break cycles of poverty by preparing underserved students to be the first in their family to attend college! #indistrict52

Team Vargas recently toured the U.S. Consulate in Tijuana and the San Diego Passport Agency to further understand the agencies’ daily workload, network with caseworkers across the nation, and learn helpful @StateDept casework tips. #CA52

Extreme MAGA Republicans are presenting working families with a terrible choice: either they inflict cruel cuts that hurt everyday Americans, or they force a devastating default on our debt. Let's put #PeopleOverPolitics!

National Small Business Week is April 30th–May 6th! #supportsmallbusiness 

Since the start of the Biden administration, small business applications have reached a high of 10.5 million, the most in any two years in our nation’s history.
Perfectly said by my colleague, @RepEscobar.

America is great today because of its diversity, understanding, and inclusion. Let us remember that in Jewish American Heritage Month as we celebrate the extraordinary contributions of Jewish Americans and work to combat antisemitism. #JAHM2023

During Asian American, Native Hawaiian, and Pacific Islander Heritage Month, in CA-52 and across the country, we celebrate the vibrant history, culture, and traditions of AANHPI communities. I wish everyone a Happy #AANHPIMonth!

@HouseDemocrats know the American people need leadership, not political games. That’s why we are putting #PeopleOverPolitics to deliver for everyday Americans and have a plan to slash deficits by $3 trillion—that’s on top of the more than $1.5 trillion we’ve already cut.

I support Israel and their right to defend themselves. This resolution signals to Iran & the globe that America also promises firm action against those who seek to bring harm to Israel.

The past few days in Washington have been chaotic as House Republicans continue to struggle to elect a Speaker, but through it all @HouseDemocrats have remained united and ready to get to work for the American people!

Today, we stood on the very steps that were stormed by a violent mob attempting to stop the peaceful transfer of power just two years ago. Our democracy was tested, but ultimately prevailed. We must continue to work to ensure that something like #January6th never happens again.

Today marks 10 years since I was first sworn-in to Congress! As the 118th Congress begins, my commitment to our community is just as strong as it was a decade ago. Forever proud to be your Congressman!  #118thCongress
Happy New Year, #CA51! May 2023 bring you and your loved ones happiness and good health.
